project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that will present multiple-choice questions to the user, track the user's score, and display the final score at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored within the code.

task.name: Define the structure for storing questions and answers
Implement the main game loop to ask questions to the user
Implement functionality to track the user's score
Implement display of final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the main game functionality including question asking and score tracking
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
